conbody.p: A copy of the basicsqlexample.mmp file for the basic SQL example application.

section.title: Introduction
section.p: The MMP project file tells the compiler how to build basicsqlexample.exe, assigns a UID, identifies the platform security capibilities, identifies the source path and files and sets the include path and libraries.

section.title: Code
section.codeblock:
// basicsqlexample.mmp // // Copyright (c) Nokia Ltd 2009. All rights reserved. //
TARGET basicsqlexample.exe TARGETTYPE exe
UID 0 0xE80000AF
CAPABILITY ReadUserData WriteUserData NetworkControl
SOURCEPATH . SOURCE BASICSQLEXAMPLE.CPP
USERINCLUDE . SYSTEMINCLUDE \Epoc32\include
LIBRARY euser.lib estor.lib
LIBRARY sqldb.lib efsrv.lib
